newsitem.title: GERMANY: Adam Opel technical development chief quits.
newsitem.headline: Adam Opel technical development chief quits.

text.p: Adam Opel AG, the German unit of U.S. carmaker General Motors Corp said on Tuesday that Juergen Stockmar, Opel board member in charge of the Technical Development Centre was to leave the company.
Opel said in a statement it had agreed to his request to leave the company at a supervisory board meeting today.
Stockmar will be replaced by Peter Hanenberger, 55, who is currently executive vice president of design, product and manufacturing engineering for GM international operations.
He will be named as Stockmar's successor at the next meeting of the Opel supervisory board.
